views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10, 11 and 12

Basic App to know when you'll need to resign your Jailbreak tool
App added to homescreen.
No options to configure.

I got reports about crashes when using a tweak to enable split view (like Medusa). If CertRemainTime crashes, disable the tweak.

Source code available

unc0ver support, TweakBox and Ignition detection In this update:
- Support Xcode generated provisioning profiles
- Support Electra 11.3.1 MultiPath from TweakBox
- Support Meridian
Adds support for g0blin/H3lix/Electra/LiberiOS Adds support for phoenix or whatever it's called Adds support for extra recipe Adds support for Pangu on iOS 9 (and maybe iOS 10 if Pangu is released for 10.3) Fixes a bug introduced with 2.2.0 that caused the first expired cert to be used instead of the last one.

Fixes timezone for the remaining time.
Thanks A LOT to Zygimantass for the full rewrite of some methods !
Fixes some crashes and explains better why your certificate might not be valid

Fixes a Location bug
2.0.0 : new UI and iPad support
2.0.1 : error catching improved
2.0.2 : fixes crash on launch if AM/PM display time is set
- 1.6 : displays local time insteads of UTC time for the expiration date
- 1.7 : adds Yalu Dark support as well as other forks
